thread.title: Re: Radio app not working for 3aw Melbourne
thread.title_full: Re: Radio app not working for 3aw Melbourne

author: SuzieQ
title: Re: Radio app not working for 3aw Melbourne
text:
Sunday
3aw Melbourne Radioapp not working on my Google Nest. Just happened in the last few days. Ok for other stations I have tried. Any ideas?
Monday
Hello, I can get Fox fm on one of my 4 devices either down here in Melbourne.
Monday
My Google Nest automatically uses RadioApp for all stations, yet I can stream music as requested from other sources as per the settings, for example, Spotify.
Monday
EDIT: Can't*
Monday
Same here in Woy Woy the last two days. I reset the device to no avail. Very annoying. All stations. The problem seems to be the App. itself
Monday
Same issue started yesterday unable to stream a number of Melbourne radio stations can only get random stations. Can’t work out how to fix it, Very annoying!
Monday
We have foxfm set to start playing on a
arm currently getting nothing. Radio app please review and fix the issue.
14 hours ago
I have the same issue. Not working on 6pr or 3aw which makes me thing it’s to do with nine as they are owned by them.
13 hours ago
Not for me, all stations, Smooth, 2GB, interstate etc. The Radio app is also faulty on my Google Pixel. The problem was once again raised on 2GB this am, not good enough. My Amazon streaming units are fine. My Google Nest software has been checked and is current. It is time to call in people like Stephen Fenech or Charlie Brown for comment.
I was contemplating purchasing a new Google Pixel, now I have second thoughts.
14 hours ago
Any thoughts on how to get radioapps attention?
14 hours ago
Have no idea. I can get all other stations just not those 2
13 hours ago
just sent them a message on radio app. Hopefully it gets resolved
an hour ago
I emailed the Radio App people ( An Australian outfit ) 4 days ago, so far as of today, May 1, not even the courtesy of a response.
18m ago
I've emailed as well, no reply or fixes yet either! Hopefully something get resolved soon!
topics: Science and Technology->information technology and computer science
